text: Sihamte arasye kupharai karaiche- yisakale kaya, ‘allaha haiche tinira majata trtiya’, athaca eka allahara bahirae ana kono ilaha na'i; arau sihamte yi kaya tara paraa sihamte birata nathakile sihamtara majata yisakale kupharai karaiche, sihamtara oparata arasye kastadayaka sasti apatita ha’ba
